column5: Have fished Chamberlain Narrows late July, but was unable to go this summer. Am now thinking of trying to go up for a short 3 day fishing trip end of August or early September. Would like some suggestions on best area of the lake to fish this time of the year and also suggestions on resorts to stay at. Do any of the resorts offer reduced rates at this time of the year? Thanks in advance for any help you can give me! Locopoco
I would fish the sharpest breaks to deep water or current. The ciscos & tulibees would be spawning at this time of year and would be back in the current areas. Wish I was going.
